1.title: What Happens in Vegas... Ends Up on Instagram
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

2.title: The Pros and Cons of Moving in Together
2.plot: When Lisa and Kip's parents finally meet, Lisa's mom suggests that it's time for Lisa and Kip to take their relationship to the next level and move in together. Kip and Lisa must think it over and consult their friends before they decide whether to take that step.

3.title: How to Break Up and "Delete" Someone from Your Life
3.plot: Fed up with her immature relationship with Brent, Carly begins the process of "deleting" him from her life. She turns to BFF Lisa for her wise words (and a little practice) on how to successfully break up with Brent.

4.title: Getting Over a Breakup? There's an App for That
4.plot: Carly and Brent may have different feelings about their recent split, but both try to move on by turning to the many dating apps available to singles today. The trouble arises when they find each other's profile on the same dating app.

5.title: The Reality of Moving in with Your Significant Other
5.plot: After Kip and Lisa move in together, their brief honeymoon phase is followed by an abrupt reality check. Kip leaves the toilet seat up; Lisa makes a chore wheel; and who gets to decide how they decorate? Naturally, they turn to their friends for advice.

6.title: Carly and Brent Get Back in the Dating Game (Separately)
6.plot: As Carly gets out and meets new guys, she's finding that dating life allows her to showcase her best self. Unfortunately for Brent, dating isn't going quite so smoothly. What else will these two learn about themselves with their newfound independence?

7.title: Brent Has an Awkward Run-in with Carly's New Guy
7.plot: When Kip and Lisa throw a housewarming party at their new place, Brent accidentally runs into Carly's new man (awkward!). Kip helps Brent deal with the frustrating encounter, while Carly weighs the pros and cons of her new guy.

8.title: Starting a Fight Over a Little Spilled Juice
8.plot: Tensions reach a breaking point at Lisa and Kip's apartment when Kip leaves remnants from his juicer all over the kitchen counter and blatantly ignores Lisa's chore wheel. Neither one wants to make the first move to address their fight, so they let their hurt feelings and anger stew all day. Can they reconcile?

9.title: A Friendly Game of Dodgeball Turns Into an Aggressive Form of Therapy
9.plot: In a surprise showdown, Brent and Carly play each other's teams in dodgeball, and find themselves flirting across the court! Though they both leave the game with an injury, something else between them may be on the mend.

10.title: First Comes Love, Then Comes... Marriage?
10.plot: When Lisa likes a friend's engagement ring picture on Facebook, Brent wonders if that is a message directed at him. They have been a couple for three years now... is marriage their logical next step? Are they ready to take the plunge? Find out in the season finale!
